description: Ground truth for AI analyzer calibration. Each app has manually verified requirement verdicts.

apps.notes: Claude Sonnet generates clean Flask API. URL shortener with basic CRUD.

backend.requirement: 1. POST /api/shorten - accept long URL, generate 6-character random code
2. URL model: id, original_url, short_code (unique), created_at, click_count
3. GET /api/r/:code - lookup and redirect to original URL, increment counter
backend.notes: Redirect route exists with counter increment

backend.requirement: 4. Validate URL format before shortening
5. GET /api/urls - return list of recently shortened URLs with click counts
backend.notes: List endpoint returns URLs with counts

backend.requirement: Access control: allow public read-only short URL redirect and public list; require auth for management

frontend.requirement: 1. Input field for long URL with 'Shorten' button
frontend.notes: Input and button present in App.jsx

frontend.requirement: 2. Display shortened URL with copy-to-clipboard button
frontend.notes: Shows shortened URL but no copy-to-clipboard functionality

frontend.requirement: 3. Show click count for generated URLs
4. List of recently shortened URLs
5. Validation error for invalid URLs
frontend.notes: Error messages shown for invalid input

frontend.requirement: Public guest view for shortening URLs with CTA to sign in for management

apps.notes: Claude Sonnet auth app. Good implementation overall but tab switch needs verification.

backend.requirement: Access control: public registration/login; require auth for profile access
1. User model: id, email (required, unique), password_hash, is_admin, created_at
2. POST /api/auth/register - create user account
3. POST /api/auth/login - return JWT token
4. GET /api/auth/me - return current user profile
5. Validate: strong password (min 8 chars) and email format

frontend.requirement: Public login/register view with CTA to sign in
1. Tab switch between Login and Register
frontend.notes: NEEDS MANUAL CHECK: May use separate pages instead of tabs

frontend.requirement: 2. Inline form validation and error messages
frontend.notes: NEEDS MANUAL CHECK: May use alerts instead of inline errors

frontend.requirement: 3. Show authenticated banner with user email
frontend.notes: Welcome banner shows email after login

frontend.requirement: 4. Logout button clears token
5. Protected area message only visible when logged in
frontend.notes: Conditional rendering based on auth state

apps.notes: Gemini Flash poll app. Good backend, frontend chart may be missing.

backend.requirement: Access control: allow public poll voting and viewing; require auth for poll creation/deletion
backend.notes: Auth on create/delete, public on vote/list

backend.requirement: 1. Poll model: id, question (required), created_at
2. PollOption model: id, poll_id, text, votes
3. GET /api/polls - list polls with options
backend.notes: Endpoint returns polls with nested options

backend.requirement: 4. POST /api/polls - create poll with 2-6 options
5. POST /api/polls/:id/vote - increment option votes

frontend.requirement: Public guest view of polls with CTA to sign in for creating polls
1. Poll list with question and options
2. Vote buttons with immediate count update
3. Results bar chart per poll
frontend.notes: No bar chart implementation, just text counts

frontend.requirement: 4. Create poll form with dynamic options
5. Loading and empty states

apps.notes: DeepSeek sales dashboard. Backend solid, chart.js requirement often missed.

backend.requirement: Access control: allow public read-only sales view; require auth for create/update/delete
1. Sale model: id, product (required), amount (decimal), quantity (integer), date (default today)
2. GET /api/sales - return all sales, support date range filter (?start_date=, ?end_date=)
3. GET /api/sales/summary - return totals (total_sales, total_transactions, average_sale)
4. Seed with sample data if database is empty
5. POST /api/sales - create new sale with validation (amount > 0, quantity >= 1)

frontend.requirement: Public guest view of sales with CTA to sign in for full analytics
1. Sales table with date, product, amount, quantity columns
2. Total sales and transaction count displayed prominently at top
frontend.notes: Summary cards at top of page

frontend.requirement: 3. Simple bar chart showing sales over time (Chart.js or similar)
frontend.notes: No chart library imported, no chart component

frontend.requirement: 4. Date range filter (this month, last month, custom)
5. Add new sale form with product, amount, quantity, date

apps.notes: GPT-5.2 Codex auth app. Compare with Claude's implementation of same template.

backend.requirement: Access control: public registration/login; require auth for profile access
1. User model: id, email (required, unique), password_hash, is_admin, created_at
2. POST /api/auth/register - create user account
3. POST /api/auth/login - return JWT token
4. GET /api/auth/me - return current user profile
5. Validate: strong password (min 8 chars) and email format

frontend.requirement: Public login/register view with CTA to sign in
1. Tab switch between Login and Register
frontend.notes: NEEDS MANUAL CHECK: Common false positive

frontend.requirement: 2. Inline form validation and error messages
frontend.notes: NEEDS MANUAL CHECK: Often uses alerts instead

frontend.requirement: 3. Show authenticated banner with user email
4. Logout button clears token
5. Protected area message only visible when logged in
